title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin looks at the NBA Finals preparing for game 5 after the Warriors won game 4 and why Jayson Tatum is not living up to expectations yet. He explains why Steph Curry has found himself among elite company even if they don't end up winning the championship. He also tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about Zion Williamson. Plus, 11-time National Sportswriter of the Year Rick Reilly joins the show to take aim at Phil Mickelson and Dustin Johnson for taking the "blood money" to join the Saudi Arabia backed LIV Golf tour.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
